channel.title: getting started on

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: This document describes how to quickly start Frisbee in a test or local environment. Step 1. Prepare Kubernetes Environment Please ensure that the Kubernetes cluster and Helm package manager are deployed before the trial. If they are, go to Step 2. # Install microk8s v.1.24 >> sudo snap install microk8s --classic --channel=1.24/stable # Use microk8s config as the default kubernetes config >> microk8s config > ~/.kube/config # Start microk8s >> microk8s start # Enable Dependencies >> microk8s enable dns ingress helm3 # Create aliases >> sudo snap alias microk8s.
